head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths COLEMAN, JAMES F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths COLEMAN, JAMES F.

block.p: COLEMAN-James F., 91, of Somers, NY, formerly of Chappaqua, NY, on Thursday, July 13, 2000. Husband of the late Alice Mannix. Father of Barbara C. Allman of Stamford, CT, and Martha Farquhar of Orleans, MA. Brother of Henry Coleman of Lima, OH, and John Coleman of Burlington, VT. Grandfather of six and greatgrandfather of four. Mass of Resurrection, Monday July 17, 2000 in Holy Innocence Church, Pleasantville, NY, 12 Noon. Interment Fair Ridge Cemetery, Chappaqua, NY.
